testPlan.name: Archify Platform Frontend Tests
testPlan.description: Comprehensive frontend testing for Archify platform including navigation, authentication, subscription management, and UI/UX

testCases.name: Navigation Order Test
testCases.description: Verify navigation order: Tableau de bord → Cours → Tarifs → Se connecter → S'inscrire
steps: Verify navigation links are in correct order
testCases.expectedResult: Navigation links work in correct order and redirect to appropriate pages

testCases.name: Dashboard Redirect Test
testCases.description: Verify dashboard redirects to home page when not authenticated
steps: Check no login page is shown
testCases.expectedResult: Dashboard redirects to home page, not login page

testCases.name: Login Form Test
testCases.expectedResult: Login form works correctly with proper validation

testCases.name: Registration Form Test
testCases.expectedResult: Registration form works with all validations

testCases.name: Auth Mode Detection Test
testCases.description: Verify auth component detects login vs register mode
testCases.expectedResult: Auth component correctly detects and displays appropriate form

testCases.name: Home Page Hero Section Test
testCases.description: Test home page hero section elements
steps: Check main heading with gradient text
testCases.expectedResult: Hero section displays correctly with all elements

testCases.name: Featured Courses Test
testCases.expectedResult: Featured courses display correctly with animations

testCases.name: Pricing Section Test
testCases.description: Test pricing section on home page
testCases.expectedResult: Pricing section shows correct plans and links work

testCases.name: Subscription Plans Test
steps: Check plan names: Vidéos Seulement, Documents Seulement, Accès Complet
testCases.expectedResult: Only 3 subscription plans displayed with correct pricing

testCases.name: Payment Provider Logos Test
testCases.expectedResult: All three payment provider logos display correctly

testCases.name: Plan Selection Test
testCases.expectedResult: Plan selection works correctly with proper highlighting

testCases.name: Glassmorphism Effects Test
testCases.expectedResult: Glassmorphism effects display correctly throughout the app

testCases.name: Gradient Backgrounds Test
testCases.expectedResult: Gradient backgrounds display correctly

testCases.name: Hover Animations Test
testCases.expectedResult: Hover animations work smoothly

testCases.name: Mobile Responsive Test
testCases.expectedResult: App is fully responsive on mobile devices

testCases.name: Tablet Responsive Test
testCases.expectedResult: App displays correctly on tablet devices

testCases.name: Desktop Responsive Test
testCases.expectedResult: App displays optimally on desktop devices

testCases.name: Page Load Performance Test
testCases.description: Test page load times and performance
steps: Check load time in Network tab
testCases.expectedResult: Pages load quickly with no errors

testCases.name: Image Loading Test
testCases.description: Test payment provider logos load correctly
steps: Check Network tab for image requests
testCases.expectedResult: All payment logos load without errors

testCases.name: Keyboard Navigation Test
testCases.expectedResult: App is fully keyboard navigable

testCases.name: Screen Reader Test
testCases.expectedResult: App is accessible to screen readers
